_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The two fools and the two who are astute: One who doesn’t recognize when they’ve made a mistake
One who doesn’t properly accept the confession of someone who’s made a mistake
One who recognizes when they’ve made a mistake
One who properly accepts the confession of someone who’s made a mistake
